summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of PMR Education Platform. Backend API achieved 100% test success rate with all 18 endpoints working correctly. Frontend testing confirmed all major features working including authentication, dashboard, disease management, bookmarks, notes, search functionality, and admin panel.

integration_issues.issue: Minor DOM attachment error during rapid navigation between pages
integration_issues.impact: Does not affect core functionality, only appears during rapid automated testing

passed_tests: Dashboard loading with stats cards (8 diseases, 8 categories)
8 PMR categories with disease counts displayed correctly
Disease detail pages with structured medical sections
Notes system allowing personal note creation and saving
Search functionality with text and category filters
All CRUD operations for diseases, categories, bookmarks, notes
User role management in admin panel
Complete navigation between all major sections
